Security.task: Git history purge — use git filter-repo or BFG Repo Cleaner to permanently remove .env.hybrid, *.pid, *.bak, audit_logs.jsonl, and .heady_deploy_log.jsonl from ALL commits in deep Git history

Enable GitHub Advanced Security + secret scanning alerts on all HeadyMe repositories to scan every PR and prevent future credential leakage
Comprehensive .gitignore hardening — append .env.hybrid, *.pid, *.bak, audit_logs*, .heady_deploy_log.jsonl, and all sensitive operational metadata patterns
